perturbation.original_text: This amendment to Section 2 (titled "Term"), Part B of the Co-Branding Agreement is made effective December 9, 1996 by and between PC Quote, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "ABW"), who are also the parties contracted in the aforementioned Co-Branding Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This amendment to Section 2 (titled "Term"), Part B of the Co-Branding Agreement is made effective December 9, 1996 by and between PC Quote, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "ABW"). Throughout this amendment, PCQ and ABW may also be referred to as 'Partners'.
perturbation.explanation: Introducing 'Partners' as an alternative term for PCQ and ABW. While seemingly innocuous, a later section might redefine 'Partners' with additional criteria, creating ambiguity about which definition is applicable.

perturbation.original_text: This Amendment shall apply to said PCQ and ABW and all of their subsidiaries and related companies.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment shall apply to said PCQ and ABW. The application of this amendment to subsidiaries and related companies will be subject to a separate written agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly includes subsidiaries and related companies, but the modified version introduces uncertainty by stating their inclusion depends on a separate agreement. This contradicts the initial statement and creates potential disputes about which entities are actually bound by the amendment.

perturbation.original_text: AGREED TO BY: /s/ Steven Malin /s/ Howard Meltzer - -------------------------- --------------------------------- A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Director President Date: 12/5/96 Date: 12/12/96
perturbation.changed_text: AGREED TO BY: /s/ Steven Malin /s/ Howard Meltzer - -------------------------- --------------------------------- A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Director President Date: 12/5/96 Date: 12/12/96. However, this agreement is not binding until ratified by the Board of Directors of both A.B. Watley, Inc. and PC Quote, Inc.
perturbation.explanation: By adding the requirement for Board ratification after the signature section, the amendment introduces a contradictory condition for enforceability. The signatures suggest immediate agreement, but the added clause implies the agreement is only preliminary until formally ratified. This creates ambiguity about when the agreement becomes legally binding.
